Content: All the talk about Philippine Daily Inquirer becoming a shill for Camille Villar reminds me of the time The Manila Times and The Philippine Star seemed to be shilling for Bong Go in 2019, so much so that they had the same format in their reports at one point.#Halalan2025

Name: Roentgen
Content: Last day of the year. Iwan na natin sina Pia Cayetano, Bato Dela Rosa, Bong Go, Lito Lapid, Imee Marcos, Bong Revilla, Francis Tolentino, Camille Villar, at lahat ng mga trapo at miyembro ng mga political dynasty sa 2024. Huwag na natin silang iboto sa #Halalan2025.

Name: #Kakampink
Content: Paka bastos talaga n'yang PUTANG INANG matandang matapobre na yan! Wag iboto sa #Halalan2025 si !

Name: Carmela Fonbuena
Content:
2001 elections saw the return of political ads in PH. Manuel Villar Jr launched his “Sipag at Tiyaga” TV, radio ads and won a come-from-behind victory in polls

The rest is history. He was senator for 12 years.  #PHvote #CampaignFinancePHRead: pcij.org/2024/10/16/spe

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Is it just me, or did the 2025 Makabayan senatorial slate trigger a domino effect of more personalities coming up with a surprise senatorial run?

From 1-Rider's Bonifacio Bosita, to Manibela's Mar Valbuena, to fisherman & Magsaysay awardee Roberto Ballon.#Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
On one hand, the Makabayan slate ran alongside Villar and Bongbong Marcos in 2010, despite their many issues.

On the other hand, the Liberal Party practically enabled Duterte in 2010-2016 despite his EJK controversies.

Do you REALLY wanna play this game? #Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Naalala niyo nung kalagitnaan ng 2013 Senate election season, nag-guest si Cynthia Villar sa "Goin' Bulilit"? Kandidato pa siya noon para Senador. 

At gusto mong isipin natin na inosenteng gag show lang ang "Goin' Bulilit"? #Halalan2025

If you've seen millennial nepo-baby Camille Villar's TV ad recently, you get the feeling that she's indeed aiming for the millennial (and Gen Z) vote.

Oh boy... #Halalan2025

Name: ABS-CBN News
Content:
As her term ends, Senator Cynthia Villar eyes the mayoralty of Las Piñas City in #Halalan2025.

She says her decision is not yet final as her husband, former Senate president Manny Villar, encourages her to run for the House of Representatives.

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Tbh, I have a hard time taking a survey seriously if, for some reason, they did not include Chel Diokno and Camille Villar. 

And why are progressive names like Espiritu and De Guzman not included despite their 2022 performance, yet Belgica and Abella are here?#Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Then-Senator Manny Villar filing his COC for his re-election bid in 2007.

Akala natin noon si Manny lang ang magse-Senador. Wala tayong ideya noon na plano pala nila na bawat isa sa kanila ay makapasok sa Senado.

(Source: The Manila, Times,  February 13, 2007)#Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Right now, another possible millennial Senate bet may be emerging:

Baste Duterte (born 1987)

If he runs for Senator and wins, he may be one of the first millennials to be elected Senator (assuming Camille Villar also runs and wins).

Mga punyetang dinastiya. #Halalan2025
